lines.text: <math>    <mrow>      <mtext>wave speed = </mtext>      <mfrac linethickness="thin">        <mrow>          <mtext>displacement of wave</mtext>        </mrow>        <mrow>          <mtext>elapsed time</mtext>        </mrow>      </mfrac>    </mrow>  </math>  <span class="KBDefinitionTag" />

secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe wave speed of a wave.
2. Calculate wave speed.

In-class assessment:
1. Calculate the wave speed of light.
Quick Review: Wave Speed
